title: ➤Spacious 1 Bed in Brighton! H+HW Included! Full Fee Paid by LL!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 41020660', 'Rent: $2,150 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Sunny 1 principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
